title: Monumental Failure
notes: Steam lists Shared/Split Screen PvP/Co-op and 22 user reviews; GameGrin review score 7/10. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Physics-based monument construction sim. Up to 16 players in Team Versus mode. Max 10 controllers, share controllers for 16 players. Team versus = split screen. Coop (up to 4 players) = shared screen.
